parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wipers can cause reduced visibility while driving, especially in heavy rain or snow, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Windshield wipers stop unexpectedly
windshield wipers work intermittently
windshield wipers fail to operate
sudden loss of visibility while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the engine to throw a rod, leading to costly repairs and potentially leaving the driver stranded. It can also lead to a loss of control of the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission fails to engage properly
the transmission slips or hesitates
the transmission makes unusual noises
the engine throws a rod
the vehicle is unable to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torque converter can cause the transmission to fail, leading to costly repairs and potentially leaving the driver stranded. It can also lead to a loss of control of the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission fails to engage properly
the transmission slips or hesitates
the transmission makes unusual noises
the torque converter falls apart
the vehicle is unable to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the tire belts can cause the tire to balloon, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side
the tire appears to be bulging or ballooning on the top
the tire has uneven wear
the vehicle is hard to steer
the tire has visible signs of belt separation.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Tire Recall and Manufacturer Response
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer to recall defective tires and provide adequate customer support can lead to continued use of faulty tires, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The manufacturer fails to acknowledge the defect
the manufacturer refuses to provide a recall or replacement
the customer is left with the financial burden of replacing defective tires
the customer experiences frustration and anxiety due to the manufacturer's lack of response.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The automatic parking brake system failure can cause the parking brake to engage unexpectedly while the vehicle is in motion, leading to loss of control, accidents, or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The parking brake engages unexpectedly while driving
the parking brake engages when trying to back up
the vehicle is unable to move
the parking brake cable needs to be manually disconnected to allow the vehicle to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An intake manifold leak can cause a decrease in engine performance, leading to reduced power and fuel efficiency, and potentially causing the engine to stall or fail, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The engine runs rough or misfires
the engine has a decrease in power or performance
the engine stumbles or hesitates
the vehicle has a decrease in fuel efficiency
the engine has a hissing or whining sound.
